title: 服务器装上tc和rc冲突==
author: 123ndsi
txt_content:
我服务器1.5.1版本的。。。。客户端两个装上没问题。、。。但是只要tc（traincraft）和rc（railcraft）一起安装上就会冲突，，（服务器）

冲突报告：

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!

Time: 13-5-18 下午5:16
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameData.findItem(GameData.java:293)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameData.findItemStack(GameData.java:316)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameRegistry.findItemStack(GameRegistry.java:483)
     at src.train.common.core.plugins.PluginRailcraft.initItems(PluginRailcraft.java:77)
     at src.train.common.core.plugins.PluginRailcraft.initialize(PluginRailcraft.java:38)
     at src.train.common.core.TrainModCore.ModsLoaded(TrainModCore.java:31)
     at src.train.common.Traincraft.modsLoaded(Traincraft.java:155)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLModContainer.handleModStateEvent(FMLModContainer.java:515)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventHandler.handleEvent(EventHandler.java:74)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.SynchronizedEventHandler.handleEvent(SynchronizedEventHandler.java:45)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatch(EventBus.java:314)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatchQueuedEvents(EventBus.java:296)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:267)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.LoadController.propogateStateMessage(LoadController.java:165)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
     at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventHandler.handleEvent(EventHandler.java:74)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.SynchronizedEventHandler.handleEvent(SynchronizedEventHandler.java:45)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatch(EventBus.java:314)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.dispatchQueuedEvents(EventBus.java:296)
     at com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus.post(EventBus.java:267)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.LoadController.distributeStateMessage(LoadController.java:98)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.initializeMods(Loader.java:695)
     at cpw.mods.fml.server.FMLServerHandler.finishServerLoading(FMLServerHandler.java:93)
     at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.onServerStarted(FMLCommonHandler.java:355)
     at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:167)

下面还有一些，，貌似没有用处。。
有什么解决方法吗？
谢谢

replies.author: c601320218
replies.txt_content: 这个是装在客户端还是服务端？

replies.author: sxx
replies.txt_content: 我会说不重要的东西偏偏最重要吗？给我马上把剩下的内容发上来
